JAP Maven Plugin
Last Published: 2019-02-11  | Version: 0.2
JAP Maven Plugin
Project Documentation
  • Project Information
  • Project Reports

jap:set-maven-properties

Full name:

org.drombler.jstore:jap-maven-plugin:0.2:set-maven-properties

Description:

Sets default values for some properties of other Maven Plugin (currently only the Maven Assembly Plugin), if they aren't set yet.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: initialize.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
<applicationZipFile> File - The application ZIP file.
Default value is: ${project.build.directory}/${project.artifactId}-${project.version}-applicationZip.zip.
User property is: jap.applicationZipFile.
<outputDirectory> File - The output directory for generated files.
Default value is: ${project.build.directory}/generated-sources/jap.
<targetDirectory> File - The target directory for the JAP file.
Default value is: ${project.build.directory}.
User property is: jap.targetDirectory.

Parameter Details

<applicationZipFile>

The application ZIP file.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: Yes
  • User Property: jap.applicationZipFile
  • Default: ${project.build.directory}/${project.artifactId}-${project.version}-applicationZip.zip

<outputDirectory>

The output directory for generated files.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: ${project.build.directory}/generated-sources/jap

<targetDirectory>

The target directory for the JAP file.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: Yes
  • User Property: jap.targetDirectory
  • Default: ${project.build.directory}
